post.body: One can separate religion from faith. But yes, religion with it's doctrine is a problem.
there is another great plague on humanity and it is PETA
religion yes, faith no. They can be separated like I have done.
so it was 4chan? Lol. At least they are not too malicious with their attacks.
i like that LR is more open. I have had a flickr and facebook app for it for a while.
I hear you, what little iPhoto i have used i have mostly liked, but I am well invested in LightRoom 2.
I feel like starting over all the time. With many things.
Thanks for that post. I have been wanting some good PS goodness since Revision3 dropped PixelPerfect.
Its not bad. The trade off is that all my classes are done by thursday and so is work.
It wasnt a paper publication, it was a web magazine with amateur contributors. Novel idea. I got the PDFs every week.
Twitter is really slow today. Damn you Mac fanboys!
Do not*
I do want to sound rude, but the problem i have with going to church is the people. Church goers make the worst christians.
I am still wiped. 5 hours of driving last night just killed me.
After an extremely long day i find myself in nashville for an emergency. Only 2 hours until i get home.
If I was anywhere but here right now I'd be ever so happy.
Six hours into my day and classes still havent started for me yet.
C'mon BAMA! This is embarassing!
Roll Tide!
well we have lost another to the Economic mess. RIP JPG Magazine. A great place for amateur photographers to meet and learn for each other.
